title: Customer Service Representative
job_overview:
Join Our Team at Atticare!
We’re a fast-growing home service company specializing in insulation, wildlife removal, rodent exclusion, and pest control. With a strong reputation for quality work and top-notch service, we’re looking for a Customer Service Representative who’s ready to make a real impact on our customers' lives and homes.

What You'll Do:

Be the friendly voice that customers hear first—answering calls, emails, and online inquiries
Schedule inspections and service appointments with accuracy and efficiency
Provide knowledgeable support on our services and guide customers through their options
Dispatch technicians and coordinate routes based on urgency, availability, and location
Follow up on leads, estimates, and open tickets to ensure smooth service delivery
Input and update customer data in our CRM system
Handle complaints or concerns with professionalism and empathy
Collaborate with sales and field teams to provide a seamless customer experience
What We're Looking For:

Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Experience in a customer service, call center, or dispatching role (home services industry is a plus)
Ability to multitask and stay organized in a fast-paced environment
Tech-savvy with experience using Google Workspace, CRM systems, and scheduling tools
Positive attitude and a genuine desire to help people
Bilingual (English/Spanish) is a bonus
